compliant.section: 當您參與本網站活動或網路調查時，我們會請您提供姓名、身份證字號、電話、電子郵件、聯絡地址及其它相關必要資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - consent, legitimate interests

compliant.section: 當您申請成為本行網路銀行客戶時，我們會請您提供個人資訊，包括：姓名、住址、電話、電子郵件信箱及其他相關必要資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - performance of a contract

compliant.section: 如果您透過電子郵件、Web Call me反應您的意見或詢問相關業務問題，我們會保存您的姓名、身分證字號、聯絡方式及其他相關必要資料。

non_compliant.section: 我們也會保留您在上網瀏覽或查詢時，由伺服器自行產生的相關記錄，包括連線設備的 IP位址、使用時間、使用的瀏覽器、瀏覽及點選資料紀錄等。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data - purpose limitation, transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: This section is too broad and lacks transparency. The bank needs to specify the exact purposes for collecting and processing browsing data, ensure data minimisation, and provide clear and accessible information to users about their data processing activities. They should also provide users with a mechanism to exercise their rights, such as accessing, rectifying, or deleting their data.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data - data minimisation, processing of special categories of personal data
non_compliant.amend: Collecting and processing national identification numbers is considered sensitive personal data under GDPR and requires a specific legal basis. The bank should avoid collecting this data unless absolutely necessary and proportionate to the purpose. They should explore alternative methods for verification and identification.
